roleset.name: CAUSE a fit, such as in a complex model

role.descr: model fits what, where, or whom

example.name: With agent
example.text: The sample size limits the number of terms that you can safely include before you begin to overfit the model.

example.name: overfitting-n: Arg1 and Arg2
example.text: Overfitting of the model with cross-validation data.

roleset.note: OVERFIT-V NOTES: Based on cryo data. Comparison with fit.01. Likely to be related only to statistics, but not necessarily restricted to statistics. Framed by Meredith. No VN/FN classes.
